nodes.text: The Taloron language was the native language of the Taloron species, who hailed from the Taloron system. In the language, the word Soknar meant "several." Cene Gilvent, an Ocsinin martial artist and a member of the Zulirian Swordmasters, had a sword named Soknar for its three blades.

Although the Taloron Hunters were first mentioned in The Star Wars Sourcebook, published by West End Games in 1987, no mention was made of the Talorons' native tongue. The language was first mentioned in passing in the sourcebook Alliance Intelligence Reports, written by C. Robert Carey, J. P. Pietrzak, and Trevor J. Wilson and published by West End Games in 1995.
